extendedInfo.description: 'Best Running/Jumping Game of 2012''Cute Character Makes You Play Again and Again''I Keep Competing With Friends Through Game Center''The Action Is Overwhelming And Totally Exciting'__________________________________________Help the funny Gangnam bunny escape from the screaming fans who are chasing him. Avoid the monkeys that come after you, chain saws, laser beams, blocking obstacles, poison spill, automatic doors, ceiling grabbers and land mines that are put in place to stop you. Jump and dash your way through them to get away!Collect as many coins on the way as possible and use them to upgrade your Gangnam character with crazy uniforms. Several power ups are in place to help you, such as ANGEL WINGS, SLOW TIME, PHASING, SUPER DASH, EXTRA DASH.Amazing graphics made this game one of the BIG HITS of 2012. Test your speed and coordination and beat all your friends through Game Center. JOIN THE GANGNAM BUNNY COMMUNITY TODAY!âââ ADDICTIVE GAME FEATURES âââ- Exciting game play with awesome graphics- 14 ACHIEVEMENTS to complete- Terrific motion with power music- Addicting game concept- Unlimited attempts to beat your personal record- Great sound effects- Tutorial mode to guide you through the game- Invite your Facebook and Twitter friends to play- Turn on/off music, sound effects and tutorial- Available on iPhone, iPad and Android

reviews.comment: Definitely weird this game puts you in the mind set of when CPU games first came out. Like black screens with green letters, old
reviews.author: char-dea miles
